titleStmt.title: The love of God, or, Love divine being the subject of these ensuing meditations / collected out of Mr. Gorings English translation ; originally penned by Peter Du Moulin ... ; digested into divine poems by William Wood ...
titleStmt.author: Wood, William.
Du Moulin, Pierre, 1568-1658.
